# Test: init fails when kamaji.yaml already exists
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exists kamaji.yaml

! exec kamaji init
stderr 'kamaji.yaml already exists'
! stdout .

# Verify original file unchanged
exec cat kamaji.yaml
stdout 'original-sprint'

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: original-sprint
tickets:
  - name: ticket-1
    tasks:
      - description: Task 1
